item.title: Git cheatsheet
item.description: Intro During the years of experience with git I have noted aside many commands which could be useful. In this article I present the most frequently used git commands and also configuration steps I always follow in a new work environment. Configuration User information $ git config --global user.name "Weselak, Pawel" $ git config --global user.email "nospam@pawelweselak.com" SSH keys $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "nospam@pawelweselak.
